ComicInfo.Summary:
Issue #8 of the Bob’s Burgers Ongoing Comic Book offers readers a heaping plate of freshly cooked stories! Louise is on a new mission, this time teaming up with Regular Sized Rudy; Gene’s battle with Captain Hook-Beard continues in Peter Pants, Part 2; and the curtains close on Tina’s tale of Jimmy Juliet and Tineo. Everyone loves Bob’s Burgers, the fan-favorite animated sitcom that airs on Fox television with other hits such as The Simpsons and Family Guy!
ContentsTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Tineo & Jimmy Juliet, Part 3Louise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities Presents: The Why Files, Part 1Gene's Rhymey Rhymes That Could One Day Be Songs Presents: Peter Pants, Part 2*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Hector Reynoso | 1 | B | Cover B | Tyler Garrison | 2 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Hector Reynoso | 3 | RE | Exceed Comic: A Divison of Jesse James Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Anna ? | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-29 20:24:25. [CVDB513663]
ComicInfo.Writer: Jeff Drake, Mark Von Der Heide
ComicInfo.Penciller: Adam Philips, Jenyffer Maria, Kimball Shirley, Krystal Fleming, Maggie Harbaugh, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.Inker: Adam Philips, Jenyffer Maria, Kimball Shirley, Krystal Fleming, Maggie Harbaugh, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.Characters: Bob Belcher, Gene Belcher, Linda Belcher, Louise Belcher, Tina Belcher
